/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `inner.real -/
/-- The sine of the sum of two angles in a possibly degenerate
triangle (where two given sides are nonzero), vector angle form. -/
theorem sin_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_sin_angle {x y : V} (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) :
    Real.sin (angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x)) = Real.sin (angle x y) :=
  by
  by_cases hxy : x = y
  · rw [hxy, angle_self hy]
    simp
  · rw [Real.sin_add, cos_angle, cos_angle]
    have hxn : «expr‖ ‖» x ≠ 0 := fun h => hx (norm_eq_zero.1 h)
    have hyn : «expr‖ ‖» y ≠ 0 := fun h => hy (norm_eq_zero.1 h)
    have hxyn : «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) ≠ 0 := fun h => hxy (eq_of_sub_eq_zero (norm_eq_zero.1 h))
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hxn
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hyn
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hxyn
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hxyn
    have H1 :
      Real.sin (angle x (x - y)) * (inner.real y (y - x) / («expr‖ ‖» y * «expr‖ ‖» (y - x))) * «expr‖ ‖» x *
            «expr‖ ‖» y *
          «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) =
        Real.sin (angle x (x - y)) * («expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» (x - y)) *
            (inner.real y (y - x) / («expr‖ ‖» y * «expr‖ ‖» (y - x))) *
          «expr‖ ‖» y :=
      by ring
    have H2 :
      inner.real x (x - y) / («expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» (y - x)) * Real.sin (angle y (y - x)) * «expr‖ ‖» x *
            «expr‖ ‖» y *
          «expr‖ ‖» (y - x) =
        inner.real x (x - y) / («expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» (y - x)) *
            (Real.sin (angle y (y - x)) * («expr‖ ‖» y * «expr‖ ‖» (y - x))) *
          «expr‖ ‖» x :=
      by ring
    have H3 :
      inner.real x x * (inner.real x x - inner.real x y - (inner.real x y - inner.real y y)) -
          (inner.real x x - inner.real x y) * (inner.real x x - inner.real x y) =
        inner.real x x * inner.real y y - inner.real x y * inner.real x y :=
      by ring
    have H4 :
      inner.real y y * (inner.real y y - inner.real x y - (inner.real x y - inner.real x x)) -
          (inner.real y y - inner.real x y) * (inner.real y y - inner.real x y) =
        inner.real x x * inner.real y y - inner.real x y * inner.real x y :=
      by ring
    rw [right_distrib, right_distrib, right_distrib, right_distrib, H1, sin_angle_mul_norm_mul_norm, norm_sub_rev x y,
      H2, sin_angle_mul_norm_mul_norm, norm_sub_rev y x, mul_assoc (Real.sin (angle x y)), sin_angle_mul_norm_mul_norm,
      inner_sub_left, inner_sub_left, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right,
      real_inner_comm x y, H3, H4, real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm,
      real_inner_eq_norm_mul_self_add_norm_mul_self_sub_norm_sub_mul_self_div_two]
    field_simp [hxn, hyn, hxyn]
    ring
#align sin_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_sin_angle sin_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_sin_angle
sin_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq:
/-- The sine of the sum of the angles of a possibly degenerate
triangle (where two given sides are nonzero), vector angle form. -/
theorem sin_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_zero {x y : V} (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) :
    Real.sin (angle x y + angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x)) = 0 :=
  by
  rw [add_assoc, Real.sin_add, cos_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_neg_cos_angle hx hy,
    sin_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_sin_angle hx hy]
  ring
#align sin_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_zero sin_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_zero

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- The **sum of the angles of a triangle** (possibly degenerate, where the triangle is a line),
oriented angles at point. -/
theorem oangle_add_oangle_add_oangle_eq_pi [Module.Oriented (exprℝ) V (Fin 2)]
    [Fact (FiniteDimensional.finrank (exprℝ) V = 2)] {p1 p2 p3 : P} (h21 : p2 ≠ p1) (h32 : p3 ≠ p2) (h13 : p1 ≠ p3) :
    (oangle) p1 p2 p3 + (oangle) p2 p3 p1 + (oangle) p3 p1 p2 = real.pi := by
  simpa only [neg_vsub_eq_vsub_rev] using
    positive_orientation.oangle_add_cyc3_neg_left (vsub_ne_zero.mpr h21) (vsub_ne_zero.mpr h32) (vsub_ne_zero.mpr h13)
#align oangle_add_oangle_add_oangle_eq_pi oangle_add_oangle_add_oangle_eq_pi

/-- Law of cosines (cosine rule), vector angle form. -/
theorem norm_sub_sq_eq_norm_sq_add_norm_sq_sub_two_mul_norm_mul_norm_mul_cos_angle (x y : V) :
    «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) * «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) =
      «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» x + «expr‖ ‖» y * «expr‖ ‖» y - 2 * «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y * Real.cos (angle x y) :=
  by
  rw [show
      2 * «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y * Real.cos (angle x y) = 2 * (Real.cos (angle x y) * («expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y)) by
      ring,
    cos_angle_mul_norm_mul_norm, ← real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, ← real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, ←
    real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, real_inner_sub_sub_self, sub_add_eq_add_sub]
#align norm_sub_sq_eq_norm_sq_add_norm_sq_sub_two_mul_norm_mul_norm_mul_cos_angle norm_sub_sq_eq_norm_sq_add_norm_sq_sub_two_mul_norm_mul_norm_mul_cos_angle
norm_eq_of_angle_sub_eq_angle_sub_rev_of:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- Converse of pons asinorum, vector angle form. -/
theorem norm_eq_of_angle_sub_eq_angle_sub_rev_of_angle_ne_pi {x y : V} (h : angle x (x - y) = angle y (y - x))
    (hpi : angle x y ≠ real.pi) : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y :=
  by
  replace h :=
    real.arccos_inj_on (abs_le.mp (abs_real_inner_div_norm_mul_norm_le_one x (x - y)))
      (abs_le.mp (abs_real_inner_div_norm_mul_norm_le_one y (y - x))) h
  by_cases hxy : x = y
  · rw [hxy]
  · rw [← norm_neg (y - x), neg_sub, mul_comm, mul_comm («expr‖ ‖» y), div_eq_mul_inv, div_eq_mul_inv, mul_inv_rev,
      mul_inv_rev, ← mul_assoc, ← mul_assoc] at h
    replace h := mul_right_cancel₀ (inv_ne_zero fun hz => hxy (eq_of_sub_eq_zero (norm_eq_zero.1 hz))) h
    rw [inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right, real_inner_comm x y, real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm,
      real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, mul_sub_right_distrib, mul_sub_right_distrib, mul_self_mul_inv,
      mul_self_mul_inv, sub_eq_sub_iff_sub_eq_sub, ← mul_sub_left_distrib] at h
    by_cases hx0 : x = 0
    · rw [hx0, norm_zero, inner_zero_left, MulZeroClass.zero_mul, zero_sub, neg_eq_zero] at h
      rw [hx0, norm_zero, h]
    · by_cases hy0 : y = 0
      · rw [hy0, norm_zero, inner_zero_right, MulZeroClass.zero_mul, sub_zero] at h
        rw [hy0, norm_zero, h]
      · rw [inv_sub_inv (fun hz => hx0 (norm_eq_zero.1 hz)) fun hz => hy0 (norm_eq_zero.1 hz), ← neg_sub, ←
          mul_div_assoc, mul_comm, mul_div_assoc, ← mul_neg_one] at h
        symm
        by_contra hyx
        replace h := (mul_left_cancel₀ (sub_ne_zero_of_ne hyx) h).symm
        rw [real_inner_div_norm_mul_norm_eq_neg_one_iff, ← angle_eq_pi_iff] at h
        exact hpi h
#align norm_eq_of_angle_sub_eq_angle_sub_rev_of_angle_ne_pi norm_eq_of_angle_sub_eq_angle_sub_rev_of_angle_ne_pi
dist_sq_mul_dist_add_dist_sq_mul_dist:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- **Stewart's Theorem**. -/
theorem dist_sq_mul_dist_add_dist_sq_mul_dist (a b c p : P) (h : (angle) b p c = real.pi) :
    dist a b ^ 2 * dist c p + dist a c ^ 2 * dist b p = dist b c * (dist a p ^ 2 + dist b p * dist c p) :=
  by
  rw [pow_two, pow_two, law_cos a p b, law_cos a p c, eq_sub_of_add_eq (angle_add_angle_eq_pi_of_angle_eq_pi a h),
    real.cos_pi_sub, dist_eq_add_dist_of_angle_eq_pi h]
  ring
#align dist_sq_mul_dist_add_dist_sq_mul_dist dist_sq_mul_dist_add_dist_sq_mul_dist
dist_sq_eq_dist_sq_add_dist_sq_sub_two_m:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr -ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr -ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/-- **Law of cosines** (cosine rule), angle-at-point form. -/
theorem dist_sq_eq_dist_sq_add_dist_sq_sub_two_mul_dist_mul_dist_mul_cos_angle (p1 p2 p3 : P) :
    dist p1 p3 * dist p1 p3 =
      dist p1 p2 * dist p1 p2 + dist p3 p2 * dist p3 p2 - 2 * dist p1 p2 * dist p3 p2 * Real.cos ((angle) p1 p2 p3) :=
  by
  rw [dist_eq_norm_vsub V p1 p3, dist_eq_norm_vsub V p1 p2, dist_eq_norm_vsub V p3 p2]
  unfold angle
  convert norm_sub_sq_eq_norm_sq_add_norm_sq_sub_two_mul_norm_mul_norm_mul_cos_angle («expr -ᵥ » p1 p2 : V)
      («expr -ᵥ » p3 p2 : V)
  · exact (vsub_sub_vsub_cancel_right p1 p3 p2).symm
  · exact (vsub_sub_vsub_cancel_right p1 p3 p2).symm
#align dist_sq_eq_dist_sq_add_dist_sq_sub_two_mul_dist_mul_dist_mul_cos_angle dist_sq_eq_dist_sq_add_dist_sq_sub_two_mul_dist_mul_dist_mul_cos_angle
dist_sq_add_dist_sq_eq_two_mul_dist_midp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- **Apollonius's Theorem**. -/
theorem dist_sq_add_dist_sq_eq_two_mul_dist_midpoint_sq_add_half_dist_sq (a b c : P) :
    dist a b ^ 2 + dist a c ^ 2 = 2 * (dist a (midpoint (exprℝ) b c) ^ 2 + (dist b c / 2) ^ 2) :=
  by
  by_cases hbc : b = c
  · simp [hbc, midpoint_self, dist_self, two_mul]
  · let m := midpoint (exprℝ) b c
    have : dist b c ≠ 0 := (dist_pos.mpr hbc).ne'
    have hm := dist_sq_mul_dist_add_dist_sq_mul_dist a b c m (angle_midpoint_eq_pi b c hbc)
    simp only [dist_left_midpoint, dist_right_midpoint, Real.norm_two] at hm
    calc
      dist a b ^ 2 + dist a c ^ 2 =
          2 / dist b c * (dist a b ^ 2 * (2⁻¹ * dist b c) + dist a c ^ 2 * (2⁻¹ * dist b c)) :=
        by
        field_simp
        ring
      _ = 2 * (dist a (midpoint (exprℝ) b c) ^ 2 + (dist b c / 2) ^ 2) :=
        by
        rw [hm]
        field_simp
        ring
      
#align dist_sq_add_dist_sq_eq_two_mul_dist_midpoint_sq_add_half_dist_sq dist_sq_add_dist_sq_eq_two_mul_dist_midpoint_sq_add_half_dist_sq
dist_mul_of_eq_angle_of_dist_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
theorem dist_mul_of_eq_angle_of_dist_mul (a b c a' b' c' : P) (r : exprℝ) (h : (angle) a' b' c' = (angle) a b c)
    (hab : dist a' b' = r * dist a b) (hcb : dist c' b' = r * dist c b) : dist a' c' = r * dist a c :=
  by
  have h' : dist a' c' ^ 2 = (r * dist a c) ^ 2
  calc
    dist a' c' ^ 2 = dist a' b' ^ 2 + dist c' b' ^ 2 - 2 * dist a' b' * dist c' b' * Real.cos ((angle) a' b' c') := by
      simp [pow_two, law_cos a' b' c']
    _ = r ^ 2 * (dist a b ^ 2 + dist c b ^ 2 - 2 * dist a b * dist c b * Real.cos ((angle) a b c)) :=
      by
      rw [h, hab, hcb]
      ring
    _ = (r * dist a c) ^ 2 := by simp [pow_two, ← law_cos a b c, mul_pow]
    
  by_cases hab₁ : a = b
  · have hab'₁ : a' = b' := by rw [← dist_eq_zero, hab, dist_eq_zero.mpr hab₁, MulZeroClass.mul_zero r]
    rw [hab₁, hab'₁, dist_comm b' c', dist_comm b c, hcb]
  · have h1 : 0 ≤ r * dist a b := by
      rw [← hab]
      exact dist_nonneg
    have h2 : 0 ≤ r := nonneg_of_mul_nonneg_left h1 (dist_pos.mpr hab₁)
    exact (sq_eq_sq dist_nonneg (mul_nonneg h2 dist_nonneg)).mp h'
#align dist_mul_of_eq_angle_of_dist_mul dist_mul_of_eq_angle_of_dist_mul
dist_eq_of_angle_eq_angle_of_angle_ne_pi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `angle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- Converse of pons asinorum, angle-at-point form. -/
theorem dist_eq_of_angle_eq_angle_of_angle_ne_pi {p1 p2 p3 : P} (h : (angle) p1 p2 p3 = (angle) p1 p3 p2)
    (hpi : (angle) p2 p1 p3 ≠ real.pi) : dist p1 p2 = dist p1 p3 :=
  by
  unfold angle at h hpi
  rw [dist_eq_norm_vsub V p1 p2, dist_eq_norm_vsub V p1 p3]

/-- The cosine of the sum of two angles in a possibly degenerate
triangle (where two given sides are nonzero), vector angle form. -/
theorem cos_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_neg_cos_angle {x y : V} (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) :
    Real.cos (angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x)) = -Real.cos (angle x y) :=
  by
  by_cases hxy : x = y
  · rw [hxy, angle_self hy]
    simp
  · rw [Real.cos_add, cos_angle, cos_angle, cos_angle]
    have hxn : «expr‖ ‖» x ≠ 0 := fun h => hx (norm_eq_zero.1 h)
    have hyn : «expr‖ ‖» y ≠ 0 := fun h => hy (norm_eq_zero.1 h)
    have hxyn : «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) ≠ 0 := fun h => hxy (eq_of_sub_eq_zero (norm_eq_zero.1 h))
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hxn
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hyn
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hxyn
    apply mul_right_cancel₀ hxyn
    have H1 :
      Real.sin (angle x (x - y)) * Real.sin (angle y (y - x)) * «expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» y * «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) *
          «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) =
        Real.sin (angle x (x - y)) * («expr‖ ‖» x * «expr‖ ‖» (x - y)) *
          (Real.sin (angle y (y - x)) * («expr‖ ‖» y * «expr‖ ‖» (x - y))) :=
      by ring
    have H2 :
      inner.real x x * (inner.real x x - inner.real x y - (inner.real x y - inner.real y y)) -
          (inner.real x x - inner.real x y) * (inner.real x x - inner.real x y) =
        inner.real x x * inner.real y y - inner.real x y * inner.real x y :=
      by ring
    have H3 :
      inner.real y y * (inner.real y y - inner.real x y - (inner.real x y - inner.real x x)) -
          (inner.real y y - inner.real x y) * (inner.real y y - inner.real x y) =
        inner.real x x * inner.real y y - inner.real x y * inner.real x y :=
      by ring
    rw [mul_sub_right_distrib, mul_sub_right_distrib, mul_sub_right_distrib, mul_sub_right_distrib, H1,
      sin_angle_mul_norm_mul_norm, norm_sub_rev x y, sin_angle_mul_norm_mul_norm, norm_sub_rev y x, inner_sub_left,
      inner_sub_left, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right, real_inner_comm x y, H2, H3,
      Real.mul_self_sqrt (sub_nonneg_of_le (real_inner_mul_inner_self_le x y)), real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm,
      real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, real_inner_eq_norm_mul_self_add_norm_mul_self_sub_norm_sub_mul_self_div_two]
    field_simp [hxn, hyn, hxyn]
    ring
#align cos_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_neg_cos_angle cos_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_neg_cos_angle
cos_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq:
/-- The cosine of the sum of the angles of a possibly degenerate
triangle (where two given sides are nonzero), vector angle form. -/
theorem cos_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_neg_one {x y : V} (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) :
    Real.cos (angle x y + angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x)) = -1 := by
  rw [add_assoc, Real.cos_add, cos_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_neg_cos_angle hx hy,
    sin_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_rev_eq_sin_angle hx hy, mul_neg, ← neg_add', add_comm, ← sq, ← sq,
    Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq]

/-- Pons asinorum, vector angle form. -/
theorem angle_sub_eq_angle_sub_rev_of_norm_eq {x y : V} (h : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y) :
    angle x (x - y) = angle y (y - x) :=
  by
  refine' real.inj_on_cos ⟨angle_nonneg _ _, angle_le_pi _ _⟩ ⟨angle_nonneg _ _, angle_le_pi _ _⟩ _
  rw [cos_angle, cos_angle, h, ← neg_sub, norm_neg, neg_sub, inner_sub_right, inner_sub_right,
    real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, real_inner_self_eq_norm_mul_norm, h, real_inner_comm x y]

/-- **Isosceles Triangle Theorem**: Pons asinorum, angle-at-point form. -/
theorem angle_eq_angle_of_dist_eq {p1 p2 p3 : P} (h : dist p1 p2 = dist p1 p3) : (angle) p1 p2 p3 = (angle) p1 p3 p2 :=
  by
  rw [dist_eq_norm_vsub V p1 p2, dist_eq_norm_vsub V p1 p3] at h
  unfold angle
  convert angle_sub_eq_angle_sub_rev_of_norm_eq h
  · exact (vsub_sub_vsub_cancel_left p3 p2 p1).symm
  · exact (vsub_sub_vsub_cancel_left p2 p3 p1).symm

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- The sum of the angles of a possibly degenerate triangle (where the
two given sides are nonzero), vector angle form. -/
theorem angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_pi {x y : V} (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) :
    angle x y + angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x) = real.pi :=
  by
  have hcos := cos_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_neg_one hx hy
  have hsin := sin_angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_zero hx hy
  rw [real.sin_eq_zero_iff] at hsin
  cases' hsin with n hn
  symm at hn
  have h0 : 0 ≤ angle x y + angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x) :=
    add_nonneg (add_nonneg (angle_nonneg _ _) (angle_nonneg _ _)) (angle_nonneg _ _)
  have h3 : angle x y + angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x) ≤ real.pi + real.pi + real.pi :=
    add_le_add (add_le_add (angle_le_pi _ _) (angle_le_pi _ _)) (angle_le_pi _ _)
  have h3lt : angle x y + angle x (x - y) + angle y (y - x) < real.pi + real.pi + real.pi :=
    by
    by_contra hnlt
    have hxy : angle x y = real.pi := by
      by_contra hxy
      exact
        hnlt
          (add_lt_add_of_lt_of_le (add_lt_add_of_lt_of_le (lt_of_le_of_ne (angle_le_pi _ _) hxy) (angle_le_pi _ _))
            (angle_le_pi _ _))
    rw [hxy] at hnlt
    rw [angle_eq_pi_iff] at hxy
    rcases hxy with ⟨hx, ⟨r, ⟨hr, hxr⟩⟩⟩
    rw [hxr, ← one_smul (exprℝ) x, ← mul_smul, mul_one, ← sub_smul, one_smul, sub_eq_add_neg,
      angle_smul_right_of_pos _ _ (add_pos zero_lt_one (neg_pos_of_neg hr)), angle_self hx, add_zero] at hnlt
    apply hnlt
    rw [add_assoc]
    exact add_lt_add_left (lt_of_le_of_lt (angle_le_pi _ _) (lt_add_of_pos_right (real.pi) real.pi_pos)) _
  have hn0 : 0 ≤ n := by
    rw [hn, mul_nonneg_iff_left_nonneg_of_pos real.pi_pos] at h0
    norm_cast  at h0
    exact h0
  have hn3 : n < 3 := by
    rw [hn, show real.pi + real.pi + real.pi = 3 * real.pi by ring] at h3lt
    replace h3lt := lt_of_mul_lt_mul_right h3lt (le_of_lt real.pi_pos)
    norm_cast  at h3lt
    exact h3lt
  interval_cases
  · rw [hn] at hcos
    simp at hcos
    norm_num at hcos
  · rw [hn]
    norm_num
  · rw [hn] at hcos
    simp at hcos
    norm_num at hcos

/-- The **sum of the angles of a triangle** (possibly degenerate, where the
given vertex is distinct from the others), angle-at-point. -/
theorem angle_add_angle_add_angle_eq_pi {p1 p2 p3 : P} (h2 : p2 ≠ p1) (h3 : p3 ≠ p1) :
    (angle) p1 p2 p3 + (angle) p2 p3 p1 + (angle) p3 p1 p2 = real.pi :=
  by
  rw [add_assoc, add_comm, add_comm ((angle) p2 p3 p1), angle_comm p2 p3 p1]
  unfold angle
  rw [← angle_neg_neg («expr -ᵥ » p1 p3), ← angle_neg_neg («expr -ᵥ » p1 p2), neg_vsub_eq_vsub_rev,
    neg_vsub_eq_vsub_rev, neg_vsub_eq_vsub_rev, neg_vsub_eq_vsub_rev, ← vsub_sub_vsub_cancel_right p3 p2 p1, ←
    vsub_sub_vsub_cancel_right p2 p3 p1]
  exact
    angle_add_angle_sub_add_angle_sub_eq_pi (fun he => h3 (vsub_eq_zero_iff_eq.1 he)) fun he =>
      h2 (vsub_eq_zero_iff_eq.1 he)
#align angle_add_angle_add_angle_eq_pi angle_add_angle_add_angle_eq_pi
